short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app will show more details in ebay pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
eBay product research made easy. Extract monthly sales,  estimated selling price,  last price the item was sold for, and estimated profit and more without entering the product page.

Market Reconn  was designed to help take your eBay sells to the next level!  

By adding Market Reconn to your Chrome browser, you can evaluate product opportunities as you search eBay's catalog, making product research quick and easy. 

With Market Reconn Chrome extension, you can: 

➤ See monthly sales history for a particular listing without  click into the listing

➤ See estimated profit at the current selling price

➤ See the last time a product sold and at what price


---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer: This extension uses Google Analytics to collect usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit: http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout
